name: Tom Hardy
summary: Tom Hardy. Actor: Inception. With his breakthrough performance as Eames in Christopher Nolan's sci-fi thriller Inception (2010), English actor Tom Hardy has been brought to the attention of mainstream audiences worldwide. However, the versatile actor has been steadily working on both stage and screen since his television debut in the miniseries Band of Brothers (2001). After being cast in the World War II drama, Hardy left his studies at the...
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar | 23 wins & 87 nominations total
